description: About 5 km of trail accessing the falls, bluffs, lake or just good ol' hiking or biking.
directions: South of Revelstoke on HWY 23, turn left on Clough Road.  Follow 1.2 km, turn right on Mt Begbie Road.  Follow the signs to Begbie Falls FSR. There is a sign down this road with a map of the trails. Another trail hed is about 150m past the sign.
title: Begbie Creek Trails
